StringTable.Label: Event_Rebellion_0x522_Name
StringTable.String: Emerging Rebellion

StringTable.Label: Event_Rebellion_0x522_Desc
StringTable.String: Intelligence reports indicate a growing rebel movement on {PLANETNAME}. There are riots in the streets and massive destruction of property.

StringTable.Label: Event_Rebellion_0x522_Choice_1_Desc
StringTable.String: Do our best to restore law and order.

StringTable.Label: Event_Rebellion_0x522_Choice_1_Details
StringTable.String: Our security forces will do their best to restore order. But expect high crime for the next several months on {PLANETNAME}.

StringTable.Label: Event_ColonialRushRepercussions_0x522_Choice_Reassess_Result
StringTable.String: Rebel movement

StringTable.Label: Event_Rebellion_0x522_Choice_2_Desc
StringTable.String: Use your central control authority to put down the rebellion.

StringTable.Label: Event_Rebellion_0x522_Choice_2_Details
StringTable.String: Using our reserves of control on {PLANETNAME} we quickly reestablish order.

StringTable.Label: Event_CivWide_Rebellion_0x522_Name
StringTable.String: Rebellion

StringTable.Label: Event_CivWide_Rebellion_0x522_Desc
StringTable.String: A wave of rebellion has swept across our civilization. Suppressed voices have now risen in unison, challenging our authority and demanding change. This widespread unrest is the result of our earlier policies and actions. We must decide how to address this crisis.

StringTable.Label: Event_CivWide_Rebellion_0x522_Choice_1_Desc
StringTable.String: Implement Reforms

StringTable.Label: Event_CivWide_Rebellion_0x522_Choice_1_Details
StringTable.String: Enacting systemic reforms could pacify the rebellion, showing our willingness to address their concerns. However, it will take several months to calm people down.

StringTable.Label: Event_CivWide_Rebellion_0x522_Choice_2_Desc
StringTable.String: Use your resources of Control to suppress the Rebellion

StringTable.Label: Event_CivWide_Rebellion_0x522_Choice_2_Details
StringTable.String: Choosing to suppress the rebellion with force is a decisive action that might quickly quell the unrest. However, this approach could further alienate our citizens and exacerbate tensions, leading to long-term instability and loss of control over our factions.

StringTable.Label: Event_Attempted_Coup_0xA34_Name
StringTable.String: Coup Attempt

StringTable.Label: Event_Attempted_Coup_0xA34_Desc
StringTable.String: Your relentless rule has pushed several of your closest generals to the brink. They have attempted a coup, seeking to overthrow your leadership and install a new regime. Fortunately, your security was able to thwart the attempt but not before several rebel ships have begun controlling areas of our space.

StringTable.Label: Event_Attempted_Coup_0xA34_1_Desc
StringTable.String: Crush the Rebellion

StringTable.Label: Event_Attempted_Coup_0xA34_1_Details
StringTable.String: Deciding to crush the rebellion sends a clear message: you will not tolerate any challenge to your authority. While this may quell the immediate threat, it could instill fear and resentment among your people, potentially leading to more secretive and dangerous forms of resistance.

StringTable.Label: Event_Rebellion_Results
StringTable.String: Rebellion

StringTable.Label: Event_Attempted_Coup_0xA34_Choice_2_Desc
StringTable.String: Seek a Peaceful Resolution

StringTable.Label: Event_Attempted_Coup_0xA34_Choice_2_Details
StringTable.String: Choosing to negotiate with the rebels is a risky move that could be seen as a sign of weakness. However, it offers a chance to address the underlying issues driving the coup, potentially leading to a more stable and unified rule in the long term, albeit at the cost of some immediate control.

StringTable.Label: Event_Attempted_Coup_0xA34_Choice_3_Desc
StringTable.String: Murder the families of the leaders

StringTable.Label: Event_Attempted_Coup_0xA34_Choice_3_Details
StringTable.String: There is only one way to prevent this sort of thing from happening in the future. Round up the Coup leaders families and kill them. Make sure to record it to show the leaders and anyone else what happens to those who disobey.

StringTable.Label: Event_Homeworld_Pathogen_0xCA42_Name
StringTable.String: Exotic Alien Lazy Genius Fever

StringTable.Label: Event_Homeworld_Pathogen_0xCA42_Desc
StringTable.String: A bizarre fever, contracted from recently discovered exotic alien life that you previously supported monetizing has swept our homeworld. While physically debilitating, causing extreme lethargy, it inexplicably boosts cognitive abilities, turning our people into temporary geniuses. We must decide how to navigate this peculiar epidemic.

StringTable.Label: Event_Homeworld_Pathogen_0xCA42_Choice_1_Desc
StringTable.String: We will monitor the situation.

StringTable.Label: Event_Homeworld_Pathogen_0xCA42_Choice_1_Details
StringTable.String: For the next year, people on {PLANETNAME} will be less diligent but far more intelligent..

StringTable.Label: Event_Homeworld_Pathogen_0xCA42_Choice_1_Result
StringTable.String: Lazy Genius Fever.

StringTable.Label: Event_Homeworld_Pathogen_0xCA43_Name
StringTable.String: Systemic Processing Overload

StringTable.Label: Event_Homeworld_Pathogen_0xCA43_Desc
StringTable.String: An unexpected systemic anomaly has affected our population. Something in the exotic fauna we have been distributing is affecting our inorganic systems.[BR][BR] While processing speeds and cognitive functions have significantly increased, mobility systems are severely impaired. This presents a unique challenge: how do we manage this new state of heightened intelligence but limited physical capability?

StringTable.Label: Event_Homeworld_Pathogen_0xCA43_Choice_1_Result
StringTable.String: System overload

StringTable.Label: Event_RogueRobotsCrisis_0xE45_Name
StringTable.String: Rogue Robot Uprising

StringTable.Label: Event_RogueRobotsCrisis_0xE45_Desc
StringTable.String: In a catastrophic turn of events that should suprrise no one, the robots that we previously used to help bolster our labor shortages have risen up. Some of them have remained loyal but others have taken to space and surrounded our shipsyards. They want our blood or whatever is the nearest equivalent.

StringTable.Label: Event_RogueRobotsCrisis_Choice_Shutdown_Desc
StringTable.String: Prepare for battle.

StringTable.Label: Event_RogueRobotsCrisis_Choice_Shutdown_Details
StringTable.String: They are using Sentinel designs. Look for them near our shipyards.

StringTable.Label: Event_TerraformingSuccess_0xF12_Name
StringTable.String: Homeworld Terraforming Triumph

StringTable.Label: Event_TerraformingSuccess_0xF12_Desc
StringTable.String: Our cautious and meticulous approach to terraforming has paid off. A new section of our homeworld has been successfully terraformed, expanding our usable land and opening up new possibilities for development and prosperity.

StringTable.Label: Event_TerraformingSuccess_Choice_Celebrate_Desc
StringTable.String: Great work!

StringTable.Label: Event_TerraformingSuccess_Choice_Celebrate_Details
StringTable.String: Our homeworld has gained an extra usable tile.

StringTable.Label: Event_ColonialGratitudeTransfer_0x9F1_Name
StringTable.String: Colonial Wealth Transfer

StringTable.Label: Event_ColonialGratitudeTransfer_0x9F1_Desc
StringTable.String: In a remarkable display of gratitude, our colonies have banded together to provide a significant one-time wealth transfer to the homeworld. This generous act is in appreciation of the greater autonomy and support they have received from us.

StringTable.Label: Event_ColonialGratitudeTransfer_Choice_Accept_Desc
StringTable.String: Graciously Accept the Gesture

StringTable.Label: Event_SentientFloraHarmony_0xH5A_Name
StringTable.String: Harmony with Sentient Flora

StringTable.Label: Event_SentientFloraHarmony_0xH5A_Desc
StringTable.String: Our respectful approach to the sentient plants on {PLANETNAME}. has led to a significant breakthrough in our understanding and cooperation with them. This has lead to a vast increase in the number of them on the planet who willingly share their wisdom with us.

StringTable.Label: Event_SentientFloraHarmony_Choice_Celebrate_Desc
StringTable.String: This is a great day.

StringTable.Label: Event_SentientFloraHarmony_Choice_Celebrate_Details
StringTable.String: There are now sentient plants available on this world along with more space for you to both live in harmony.

StringTable.Label: MorePowerFleetIncreaseMoves_Name
StringTable.String: Emergency Speed

StringTable.Label: MorePowerFleetIncreaseMoves_Dec
StringTable.String: Orders fleet to go beyond their maximum rated speed.

StringTable.Label: StarbaseModulesPower_Name
StringTable.String: Rush Starbase Modules

StringTable.Label: StarbaseModulesPower_Dec
StringTable.String: Use your vast power to impel private industry to deliver you some new modules for use at Starbases.
